defaultValue.description: The value of the radio item that should be checked when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the radio items.
defaultValue.description_zh: 初始呈现时应检查的单选项的值。在不需要控制单选项状态时使用。

:v-model.description: The controlled value of the radio item to check. Should be binded with v-model.
:v-model.description_zh: 要检查的单选项的受控值。应与 v-model 绑定

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with radio items.
disabled.description_zh: 为真时，阻止用户与单选项交互。

name.description: The name of the group. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.
name.description_zh: 组的名称。作为名称/值对的一部分，与其所属表单一起提交。

required.description: When true, indicates that the user must check a radio item before the owning form can be submitted.
required.description_zh: 如果为 true，则指示用户必须先检查单选项目，然后才能提交所属表单。

dir.description: The reading direction of the radio group. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 无线电组的阅读方向。如果省略，则全局继承自 DirectionProvider 或采用 LTR（从左到右）读取模式。

loop.description: When true, keyboard navigation will loop from last item to first, and vice versa.
loop.description_zh: 如果为 true，键盘导航将从最后一项循环到第一项，反之亦然。

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。
